# Mental Health - Cohen Mansfield Agitation Inventory (CMAI)**Resident:**                       **Location:**                        **Score:** NA
**Category:** NA## A. Physical Aggression
Review each of 29 agitated behaviours and click on how often each was manifested by the Resident over the last 2 weeks. POC homes can summarize the documentation captured in the CMAI-SF lookback report as well as mood, behaviour and cognition tasks. **1=never, 2= less than once/wk, 3=1-2x/wk, 4=few x/wk, 5=1-2x/day, 6=few x/day, 7=few x/hr**| Behavior                                          | 1 | 2 | 3 | 4 | 5 | 6 | 7 |
